segments.text: Yes , I'm rather good at driving .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need you to teach me how to drive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but do you have your learner's permit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever driven a car before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I drove a car before , but only once .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you aware of all the controls in the car ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I already know all of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When would you like me to start teaching you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Call me tomorrow , and we'll get started .
segments.speaker: S2
